definition: to do sth by mistake (with one's hand)/to make a slip of the hand (e.g. click the wrong button)
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
second (unit of time)/arc second (angular measurement unit)/(coll.) instantly
lapse/mistake/to make a mistake/fault/service fault (in volleyball, tennis etc)
to break the rules/an illegality/a foul

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to go smoothly/to come off/to succeed
to send/to give as a present
to err/to dial a wrong number/to make a typo
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
